GeneDef.label: dormant drone
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are dormant hivemind drones. If the hivemind calls them, they will respond.

GeneDef.label: hivemind resyncer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are able to awaken the dormant genes of potential hivemind drones.

customEffectDescriptions.li: After <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind synchronization</color>, it awakens <color=#8a8ae6>dormant</color> drones, connecting them to the <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color>.

GeneDef.label: hivemind dependency
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are dependent on the hivemind; without the hive, their genetics slowly self-destruct, leading to a coma from time to time.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Carrier falls into a <color=#8a8ae6>coma</color> every 9-15 days if not part of the <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color>.
